About Me

Hello! I'm Nathan, a software engineer based in Albuquerque, NM.
I enjoy creating things that live on the internet, whether that be websites, applications, or anything in between. I have always had a builders mentality and get satisfaction from people enjoying my projects.

The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle. -Steve Jobs

Projects

You Pick

You Pick is a website that allows you to like or dislike restaurants within a 10 mile radius. Once you like a restaurant the restaurant will show up in your "likes" page. You can also follow people and match up with common restaurants. For this website I used React, React Bootstrap, MySQL Yelp for our REST Apis, ERD, Object Oriented programming, Unit testing, Asana, Docker, GitHub, Digital Ocean, CSS, and more.

Coming Soon!

New Mexico Recipes

I created this website to showcase New Mexico cuisine and have traditional recipes all in one place. For this website I used HTML, Bootstrap, CSS, Google Domains, Google Analytics, Mailgun, GitHub, Digital Ocean, Docker, and Balsamiq wireframes for planning.

nmrecipes.com

My Personal Portfolio

I made this site to showcase my projects and the technologies I am familiar with. I plan to continue adding more projects to the site as time goes on. On this project, I used HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, GitHub, Docker, Digital Ocean, Google Domains, and Balsamiq wireframes for planning.
